title: Classic Pixel Home Pack 1: 150 Essential Home Decor Items in 3 resolutions
description: A comprehensive collection of 150 unique interior design elements crafted in a classic pixel art style. Three size variations for each item (1024x1024, 512x512, 256x256 pixels), ensuring compatibility with different screen resolutions and game scales
longDescription:
Bring nostalgic charm and a retro feel to your game with the "Classic Pixel Home Pack 1". This first edition asset collection provides an extensive range of 150 pixel art images, depicting vintage interior items that will imbue any project with the essence of a bygone era.


Key Features:


A comprehensive collection of 150 unique interior design elements crafted in a classic pixel art style.

Three size variations for each item (1024x1024, 512x512, 256x256 pixels), ensuring compatibility with different screen resolutions and game scales.

A total of 450 PNG images with transparent backgrounds, ready to be integrated seamlessly into your game's environment.

Carefully categorized assets to save development time and help you find the perfect piece of furniture for any pixelated room.

Versatility of Use:


Whether you're developing a retro RPG, a simulation game, or even a modern mobile game that requires a touch of pixel art, this pack has you covered. The diverse range of furniture—from plush armchairs to elegant chandeliers—enables you to furnish virtual spaces in countless unique ways.


Easy Integration:


Each item is meticulously designed to align with grid-based layouts common in pixel art games, which makes placing and layering these assets into your game's world a breeze. With transparent backgrounds and standardized resolutions, your design process will be efficient and straightforward.


Support and Updates:


While this is the first version of the "Classic Pixel Home Pack", we are committed to its continuous improvement. Future updates may include additional items and sizes based on user feedback, which we highly value.


We encourage you to share your experience and suggestions for this pack. Your ratings and reviews not only help us to enhance this asset but also assist fellow developers in making informed decisions.


For support or inquiries, please reach out to us at adeiliz2023@gmail.com, and we'll be delighted to assist you.


Experience the charm of pixel art in your game with the "Classic Pixel Home Pack". Add to cart now and start creating!
technicalDetails:
Функции:

Количество чертежей: 150 различных изображений в 3 разрешениях — 450 шт.

Количество текстур:

1024х1024 пикселей — текстура 150

512x1512 пикселей — текстура 150

256x256 пикселей — текстура 150

Поддерживаемые разработки платформы:

Окна:Да

Мак: Да

Важные/дополнительные примечания: пакет Classic Pixel Home Pack включает 150 пиксельных графических элементов в 3 разрешениях: 1024, 512 и 256 пикселей с прозрачным фоном для четкого и универсального использования в игровом дизайне.
